title: Spheron Network (SPON) Gets Listed on Bitunix!
content:
Dear Bitunix Users,
Spheron Network (SPON) is getting listed on Bitunix. The supported trading pair will be SPON/USDT on the spot market.
Deposit & Withdrawal
Deposits Effective Immediately
Withdrawal: 08:00 on August 26, 2025 (UTC)
Spot Trading
Spot trading for SPON/USDT will start at 08:00 on August 26, 2025 (UTC).
Project Introduction
Spheron Network (SPON)
Spheron is building the world’s largest community-powered compute stack for AI, Web3, and agentic apps—decentralized, verifiable, and owned by the builders, not the cloud. Already powering leaders like Gensyn, Kuzco, Gradient, and Sentient, Spheron is fueling a new wave of on-chain AI and compute infra. With 44,000+ nodes across 170+ geos, the network boasts $100M+ in distributed compute and is growing fast. Since launching Spheron AI and Spheron Console, we’ve scaled to $12M ARR, and our 400,000+ strong global community continues to push boundaries from East to West.
Official Website: https://www.spheron.network/
Blockchain Explorer: https://basescan.org/token/0x080D43c2164AFdBc3712422CE78Ab902ccaB5CA1
Regards,
Bitunix Team
August 26, 2025

The cryptocurrency market is available worldwide 24 x 7 for trading with no market close or open times. Please do your own risk assessment when deciding how to invest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Bitunix attempts to screen all projects before they come to market. However, even with the best due diligence, there are still possible risks when investing. Bitunix is not liable for investment gains or losses.
